data.text: @frashutc @DFB_storyhouse @jamiesmart @PhilipPullman @philipreeve1 @LissaKEvans @whatSFSaid @MESalisbury @neillcameron @JGreenAuthor @gilliancross Oh my goodness, this is the most adorable photo ever! I hope you & the family are doing okay & recovering well. Thank you so much for putting on such a wonderful showcase & thank you for inviting me to be a part of it ^_^

@frashutc @DFB_storyhouse @jamiesmart @PhilipPullman @Lillustrator @philipreeve1 @LissaKEvans @whatSFSaid @MESalisbury @neillcameron @JGreenAuthor Glad to see they’re already learning about books! Very sorry not to see you last night, Fraser. I hope you’re not too much affected and all better soon.

@frashutc @DFB_storyhouse @jamiesmart @PhilipPullman @Lillustrator @philipreeve1 @LissaKEvans @whatSFSaid @MESalisbury @JGreenAuthor @gilliancross Fraser! So sorry to hear about the covid, hope everyone is well and safely through it soon.

@frashutc @DFB_storyhouse @jamiesmart @PhilipPullman @Lillustrator @philipreeve1 @LissaKEvans @whatSFSaid @MESalisbury @neillcameron @gilliancross But I'm very sorry to hear about the Covid.... hope you're all Ok x

@frashutc @DFB_storyhouse @jamiesmart @PhilipPullman @Lillustrator @philipreeve1 @LissaKEvans @MESalisbury @neillcameron @JGreenAuthor @gilliancross Thanks to everyone at DFB for such a wonderful showcase - it was a total pleasure to be part of it. Personally, I felt thrilled as a reader to see so many wonderful new books to get excited about!
